ivardefs.name: adjustment
ivardefs.desc: Total amount of all adjustments to this payment included in this transaction which are not related to this claim's adjudication.

ivardefs.name: amount
ivardefs.desc: Benefits payable less any payment adjustment.

ivardefs.name: date
ivardefs.desc: Estimated date the payment will be issued or the actual issue date of payment.

ivardefs.name: identifier
ivardefs.desc: Issuer's unique identifier for the payment instrument.

ivardefs.name: type
ivardefs.desc: Whether this represents partial or complete payment of the benefits payable.

properties.desc: Payment details for the adjudication of the claim.
